name: Word Searching Whilst Pointing and Clicking: The Game
name_original: Word Searching Whilst Pointing and Clicking: The Game
description:
~extension of ludum dare page

This game can be played on a mouse or touchpad or even on a touchscreen device (I haven't tested it though there).

This is a word search game. This means you look for words.

There are npcs who show you what the words do and can be used for various things.

Made in around 2 days for ludum dare.
